channel.title: Rock/Metal charts
channel.description:
Well I dont know if this kind of topic is already out there, but anyways post your top 10 bands here and ill make a daily/weekly/monthly/whatever chart of it (yes im bored). Nr. 1 gets 10 points, NR. 2 gets 9 etc... so as a start here is mine:
1. Guns 'N Roses (10p) 2. Dragonforce (9p) 3. Sonata Arctica (8p) 4. Metallica (7p) 5. Black Sabbath (6p) 6. Iron Maiden (5p) 7. AC/DC (4p) 8. Nightwish (3p) 9. In Flames (2p) 10. Edenbridge (1p)

item.title: Rock/Metal charts
item.dc:creator: @pko pko
item.description:
@pko wrote:

  1. Guns N Roses (favorite band :o)
  2. Queen
  3. Def Leppard
  4. AC/DC
  5. Aerosmith
  6. Bon Jovi
  7. Warrant
  8. Whitesnake
  9. Van Halen
  10. Montley Crew
